attributes.action: Gain Free Bus Travel For Young People in Leeds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Members of the Leeds Youth Council believe that young people in Leeds should be given the oppertunity to travel on the cities buses fo free. We believe that if the young people in London can have this priviledge then why shouldn't we?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
